main event: A source observed a flying object resembling a vertical rod with five spherical items above it in Moscow and Dniepropetrovsk during the summer of 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as having a disk-shape and emitting sparks,The source observed the object for about 10-15 seconds during each sighting,It was suggested that the spherical items may have been balloons, but the source was uncertain,The sighting was corroborated by other prisoners of war who witnessed the same object from different locations,There was a discussion among the observers about the possibility of it being something new and not related to any known phenomenon.
sighted object: a vertical rod with five spherical items arranged above it
witness description: prisoners of war and laborers in the area
